name: Sudoku TD
description:
This is my first game ever.
The WebGL version is really bad for some reason. :( DL for slightly better experience

ALSO

---UDC Game Jam---

Theme is "Death is not the end"

In Sudoku TD you get to commit suicide trying to take down as many enemies each round as possible. Sounds really dumb now that I am done with this project.

Game-play:

///The faster you are moving the stronger your abilities\\\

-If you REALLY have to play the WebGl avoid using the burning dude.

-During build phase place down "towers" which are your playable characters.-Hold shift to place multiple towers.
-When you are not building you can take control of your character by right-clicking them and will be taken to a third-person camera.
-Control your character with WASD keys, Shift is dash and Space is Jump. Shift and Dash cost you "Honour" which is your limited resource. 
-Left click to commit suicide. The faster you are moving in the moment of suicide the more debilitating the effects will be.

-During death cam you can press "Space" to skip.

-You can press "R" at anytime to restart the game.

Hope you like it, I'll try to fix it according to feedback after the Jam is over if people enjoy it.

-Let me know if you like my tree shader? 

-Sorry for the horrible UI. :)

-Please lots of feedback.

Big thanks to Exanite and SteveSmith from UDC discord for always helping me out in the "Help" chat for the last few months.
